summary: Billy Byrne is going to be the Next Big Thing - the next pop idol, the next art scandal, the next screen dream. Doors and worlds of possibility open up. Then it all goes wrong. The world doesn't care about his style, his voice, his thing.
cast: Max Beesley|Emily Corrie|Tom Bell|Ciarán McMenamin|Jason Isaacs|Kate Ashfield|Anthony Higgins|Joseph Bennett|Ronnie McCann|Frank Harper|Udo Kier|Simon Gregor|Brian Sewell|Stephen Dorff|Stephen Graham|Liz May Brice|Danny Midwinter|Rick Warden|Melissa Hilton|Laurie Hagen|Sarah Shackleton|Ronny Quirke|Alexander Pownall|Sienna Guillory|Ian Puleston-Davies|Charlie Caine|James Hooton|Michael Hodgson|Glyn Pritchard|Julian Rivett|John Lloyd Stephenson|Mike Anonymous|Junix Inocian|Veronica Clifford|Nick Ellsworth|Ray Boot|Charlotte Emmerson|Stephen Norrington|Ian Morse|Paul Williamson|Kraig Thornber|Anthony Parker|Burnell Tucker|Arthur Whybrow|Sayuri Ema|Kanako Morishita|Keith Woodason|Peggy Shields|Audrey Tom|Sean Cronin|Derek Lea|Ethan Mahieu
title: The Last Minute
